mapper.select: SELECT user_info.USER_ID, ID, NAME, generated_date, authority_name FROM user_info INNER JOIN authority_rel ON user_info.user_id = authority_rel.user_id INNER JOIN authority ON authority_rel.authority_id = authority.authority_id;

update.foreach: UPDATE authority_rel SET authority_id = (SELECT authority_id FROM authority WHERE authority_name = #{item.authority[index]} ) WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM user_info WHERE id = #{item.list[index]})
